title: Consumer spending in Pakistan 2013 - 2018 , per capita
summary: The statistic shows the number of mobile peer in the united from 2013 to 2018 . In 2014 , the number of smartphone users in the united states amounted to roughly 28.15 billion , indicating a decrease of 154 million .
gold: This statistic depicts consumer spending in Pakistan from 2013 to 2018 , per capita . In 2013 , Pakistan 's consumer spending per capita was 995 U.S. dollars .
